about_the_game:
NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim!

Play Episode 1 Free on Steam!

Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

This is an open-ended series with no ending planned. It's like a TV show that will continue until it's canceled.

Wraith and Tide are back home on Site 6 and everything seems fine...but why wasn't Major Denise arrested?  Why is General Heath Tide acting like her friend now?  What did she do to Tide's father!

Monsters Harse and Gila must escape Bolivia together and turn into unlikely bedfellows.  Gila loves his porcupine partner, but Harse knows of his violent reputation and wants to keep his distance.  Can Gila convince Harse he's changed his ways?

Includes a NSFW scene and a illustrated romance scene between Wraith and Tide!

An on-going visual novel series with new 1 to 2 hour stand-alone game episodes coming out monthly in 2025!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64+
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or Higher, Both Intel and Silicon
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
